name: Conflict Management
description:
Hey there, so this game was my first game, it was done for the mini Jam #87 in 36 hours (for initial version) so yes it is pretty bad and incomplete but not bad for a first go.

The limitation I had to meet for this was the player had to be a pacifist. The idea I had was to make a game where you beat threats by using your choice of the five conflict resolution strategies. 

In Future versions I want to improve animations, add more sound effects, add the rest of the missing textures (like this screen), and add scaling difficulty.

CONTROLS 

- wasd for movement

-  1 to select Collaborating, this takes time (-30) but removes the monster and gains you money, it truely is the ideal solution (generally)

- 2 to select Competing, this makes a monster leave but increases the damage you take by 1 

- 3 to select Accomodating, this makes a monster leave but costs 5 Minions (health)

- 4 to select Compromising, this makes a monster leave but costs 5 Money 

The Fifth strategy is Avoiding, monsters leave automatically after 1 minute

 - Left Click to make eye contact and negotiate with a monster (click on or behind the monster)

Press the button to start, and thanks for playing :)

Character art by Luiz Melo 

Background art by Zhivko Minchev

Both can be found on the Unity asset store (the ones I used were free)
